title: The node's key retrieval announcement
content:
The node's key retrieval announcement

Dear KOC users:

        The KOC network will officially open the game ecosystem on August 6, 2019.Until then, the OASIS team will decide on the open node key quota, which will be available on the site between now and the start of the game.All the users who get the node quota will be made public, and a huge amount of ETH reward will be given to the players who complete the node task in the later period.

The OASIS team welcomes you

July 29, 2019

The telegraph group:https://t.me/KeyOfContract2
